name: Provenance Fact-check
description: Provenance is an AI-powered fact-checking agent and data verification platform built on blockchain. Its purpose is to make information verifiable, traceable, and trustworthy in the AI-driven era. The system identifies and records the provenance, or original source, of any digital content, enabling users, organizations, and AI systems to verify truth and detect misinformation. Provenance operates as both an AI agent and a SaaS platform. It provides real-time fact-checking on social platforms like Twitter/X, as well as a dashboard and APIs for enterprises. Every verified claim is stored on the Provenance Chain in a structured format, ensuring transparent, auditable, and machine-readable data for future retrieval and AI model training.
